sentences.en: Coleoptile A sheath like structure that protects the developing plumule in grasses.
sentences.cn: 用来保护发育的胚芽的鞘状的结构.

sentences.en: The drupe fruit tree can't fruit in the dysplasia of the plumule.
sentences.cn: 核果类果树在胚芽发育异常时不能坐果.

trans.tran_cn: 胚芽，胚茎，（小鸟的）绒羽，幼芽
trans.tran_en: the embryonic shoot of seed-bearing plants
